entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as being on the sofa and reacting to the news of Sirius's death. He is described as having a glass of mead knocking on his head.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as not looking at Uncle Vernon and not knowing what to say when Dumbledore breaks the news about Sirius's death.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as explaining the legacy of Sirius's possessions to Harry and trying to continue with his explanation despite Uncle Vernon's interruption.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as being dead and leaving behind a legacy for Harry. He is also referred to as Harry's godfather.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is mentioned as the bank where Harry needs to add gold to his account in order to inherit Sirius's possessions.

relationships.description: Dumbledore explains the legacy of Sirius's possessions to Harry.
Sirius left behind a legacy for Harry, including his personal possessions and number twelve, Grimmauld Place.
